nodes.text: The Sixth Kin was a criminal organization that was led by Wen Delphis and operated out of the Worker's District in the city Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica during the Imperial Era. The organization utilized the Aurebesh character 6 as its symbol, which was present on a sign above the entrance to its headquarters and on the jackets of its lieutenants, such as Ariole Yu.

The assassin Just Lucky formerly worked with the Sixth Kin. After his brother, the gambler Pak, became indebted to Delphis and the Sixth Kin, Lucky intended to pay off his debt by returning to operating for the Sixth Kin.
